item.description:
Here's the plan:
7-9 dinner at New Shanghai on Hudson St in Chinatown (it's right across the street) plan $10-$20 cash for the food. We will divide the check evenly
9-11/12 Karaoke at Goldenleaf in a private room. Plan to bring $10-$15 for Karaoke.
Rates are
1-15ppl $55/hr
16-20+ $100/hr
we will plan on two hours and see how it goes from there.
I will cap this at 18 for now. If you want to come too please let us know and we'll increase the count and get a bigger room.

We'll need to RSVP responsibly as we'll need to make reservations. dinner is flexible but the room probably won't be.

http://glkaraokebosto...
item.why: It's fun and Winter has been long...

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Dinner and Karaoke
